trans-unit.target: 成功完成阶段处理程序（0.2.4）

trans-unit.source: text is written in English, American spelling is preferred
than to use the simplified form:
the “If-Modified-Since” request header field is ignored (0.7.34);
the “Referer” field is missing in the request header;
trans-unit.target: 请求标头中缺少“ Referer”字段；

trans-unit.source: the “Referer” field is present in the request header, but its value has been deleted by a firewall or proxy server; such values are strings that do not start with “http://” or “https://”;
trans-unit.target: 请求标头中存在“ Referer”字段，但其值已被防火墙或代理服务器删除；这些值是不以“ http:// ”或“ https:// ” 开头的字符串；

trans-unit.source: the “Referer” request header field contains one of the server names;
trans-unit.target: “ Referer”请求标头字段包含服务器名称之一；

trans-unit.source: the “X-Forwarded-For” client request header field with the $remote_addr variable appended to it, separated by a comma. If the “X-Forwarded-For” field is not present in the client request header, the $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for variable is equal to the $remote_addr variable.
trans-unit.target: “ X-Forwarded-For”客户端请求标头字段，附加了 $remote_addr 变量，并用逗号分隔。如果客户端请求标头中不存在“ X-Forwarded-For”字段，则 $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for 变量等于 $remote_addr 变量。

trans-unit.target: 其工作进程使用其凭据的用户应有权在具有此类日志的目录中创建文件；

trans-unit.target: 该 string 从 send 参数，如果指定，被送往;

the TCP connection was successfully established;

trans-unit.target: 在找到的位置内指定的该模块的指令将被依次执行。

trans-unit.target: 编码方法。可能的值包括 none ， url 和 entity 。默认情况下，使用 entity 。

trans-unit.source: the file is opened and closed for each log write. However, since the descriptors of frequently used files can be stored in a cache, writing to the old file can continue during the time specified by the open_log_file_cache directive’s valid parameter
trans-unit.target: 每次写入日志时都会打开和关闭文件。但是，由于可以将常用文件的描述符存储在缓存中，因此可以在open_log_file_cache指令的 valid 参数指定的时间内继续写入旧文件

trans-unit.source: the first matching regular expression (in order of appearance in the configuration file)
trans-unit.target: 第一个匹配的正则表达式(按在配置文件中出现的顺序排列

trans-unit.target: 客户端支持的最高SSL协议版本(1.15.2)

trans-unit.target: 最长的以星号结尾的通配符名称，例如“ mail.* ”

trans-unit.source: the longest wildcard name starting with an asterisk, e.g. “*.example.com”
trans-unit.target: 以星号开头的最长通配符名称，例如“ *.example.com ”

trans-unit.target: 如果重写了请求URI ，则重复该循环，但不超过10次。

the number of UTF-16 units of code from the source string converted to UTF-8
the number of bytes modified in the destination Uint8Array
the number of bytes sent to a client

the time during which the specified number of unsuccessful attempts to communicate with the server should happen to consider the server unavailable;

trans-unit.source: the use of a session cache is gently disallowed: nginx tells a client that sessions may be reused, but does not actually store session parameters in the cache.

trans-unit.source: the use of a session cache is strictly prohibited: nginx explicitly tells a client that sessions may not be reused.
trans-unit.target: 严格禁止使用会话缓存:nginx明确告诉客户端,会话不能被重复使用。

trans-unit.target: 那么只有200、301、302的响应被缓存。

trans-unit.target: 这意味着PCRE库较旧，应改为尝试语法“ ?P<name> ”。捕获也可以以数字形式使用：

trans-unit.source: this parameter (0.7.42) determines (via the IPV6_V6ONLY socket option) whether an IPv6 socket listening on a wildcard address [::] will accept only IPv6 connections or both IPv6 and IPv4 connections. This parameter is turned on by default. It can only be set once on start.
trans-unit.target: 此参数（0.7.42）（通过 IPV6_V6ONLY 套接字选项）确定侦听通配符地址 [::] 的IPv6套接字是仅接受IPv6连接还是接受IPv6和IPv4连接。默认情况下，此参数是打开的。启动时只能设置一次。

trans-unit.source: this parameter (0.8.44) sets the associated routing table, FIB (the SO_SETFIB option) for the listening socket. This currently works only on FreeBSD.
trans-unit.target: 此参数（0.8.44）设置侦听套接字的关联路由表FIB（ SO_SETFIB 选项）。目前，这仅适用于FreeBSD。

trans-unit.source: this parameter (1.1.11) configures the “TCP keepalive” behavior for the listening socket. If this parameter is omitted then the operating system’s settings will be in effect for the socket. If it is set to the value “on”, the SO_KEEPALIVE option is turned on for the socket. If it is set to the value “off”, the SO_KEEPALIVE option is turned off for the socket. Some operating systems support setting of TCP keepalive parameters on a per-socket basis using the TCP_KEEPIDLE, TCP_KEEPINTVL, and TCP_KEEPCNT socket options. On such systems (currently, Linux 2.4+, NetBSD 5+, and FreeBSD 9.0-STABLE), they can be configured using the keepidle, keepintvl, and keepcnt parameters. One or two parameters may be omitted, in which case the system default setting for the corresponding socket option will be in effect. For example,
trans-unit.target: 此参数（1.1.11）为侦听套接字配置“ TCP keepalive”行为。如果省略此参数，则操作系统的设置对套接字有效。如果将其设置为值“ on ”，则为套接字打开 SO_KEEPALIVE 选项。如果将其设置为值“ off ”，则套接字的 SO_KEEPALIVE 选项将关闭。某些操作系统支持使用 TCP_KEEPIDLE ， TCP_KEEPINTVL 和 TCP_KEEPCNT 套接字选项在每个套接字的基础上设置TCP Keepalive参数。在此类系统（当前为Linux 2.4 +，NetBSD 5+和FreeBSD 9.0-STABLE）上，可以使用 keepidle 对其进行配置。， keepintvl 和 keepcnt 参数。可以省略一个或两个参数，在这种情况下，相应套接字选项的系统默认设置将生效。例如，

trans-unit.source: this parameter (1.9.1) instructs to create an individual listening socket for each worker process (using the SO_REUSEPORT socket option on Linux 3.9+ and DragonFly BSD, or SO_REUSEPORT_LB on FreeBSD 12+), allowing a kernel to distribute incoming connections between worker processes. This currently works only on Linux 3.9+, DragonFly BSD, and FreeBSD 12+ (1.15.1).
trans-unit.target: 此参数（1.9.1）指示为每个工作进程创建一个单独的侦听套接字（在Linux 3.9+和DragonFly BSD上使用 SO_REUSEPORT 套接字选项，在FreeBSD 12+上使用 SO_REUSEPORT_LB ），从而允许内核在工作进程之间分配传入的连接。当前仅在Linux 3.9 +，DragonFly BSD和FreeBSD 12+（1.15.1）上有效。

trans-unit.source: this parameter configures the “TCP keepalive” behavior for the listening socket. If this parameter is omitted then the operating system’s settings will be in effect for the socket. If it is set to the value “on”, the SO_KEEPALIVE option is turned on for the socket. If it is set to the value “off”, the SO_KEEPALIVE option is turned off for the socket. Some operating systems support setting of TCP keepalive parameters on a per-socket basis using the TCP_KEEPIDLE, TCP_KEEPINTVL, and TCP_KEEPCNT socket options. On such systems (currently, Linux 2.4+, NetBSD 5+, and FreeBSD 9.0-STABLE), they can be configured using the keepidle, keepintvl, and keepcnt parameters. One or two parameters may be omitted, in which case the system default setting for the corresponding socket option will be in effect. For example,
trans-unit.target: 此参数为侦听套接字配置“ TCP keepalive”行为。如果省略此参数，则操作系统的设置对套接字有效。如果将其设置为值“ on ”，则为套接字打开 SO_KEEPALIVE 选项。如果将其设置为值“ off ”，则套接字的 SO_KEEPALIVE 选项将关闭。某些操作系统支持使用 TCP_KEEPIDLE ， TCP_KEEPINTVL 和 TCP_KEEPCNT 套接字选项在每个套接字的基础上设置TCP Keepalive参数。在此类系统（当前为Linux 2.4 +，NetBSD 5+和FreeBSD 9.0-STABLE）上，可以使用 keepidle 进行配置， keepintvl 和 keepcnt 参数。可以省略一个或两个参数，在这种情况下，相应套接字选项的系统默认设置将生效。例如，

trans-unit.source: this parameter determines (via the IPV6_V6ONLY socket option) whether an IPv6 socket listening on a wildcard address [::] will accept only IPv6 connections or both IPv6 and IPv4 connections. This parameter is turned on by default. It can only be set once on start.
trans-unit.target: 此参数（通过 IPV6_V6ONLY 套接字选项）确定侦听通配符地址 [::] 的IPv6套接字是仅接受IPv6连接还是接受IPv6和IPv4连接。默认情况下，此参数是打开的。启动时只能设置一次。

trans-unit.source: this parameter instructs to make a separate bind() call for a given address:port pair. The fact is that if there are several listen directives with the same port but different addresses, and one of the listen directives listens on all addresses for the given port (*:port), nginx will bind() only to *:port. It should be noted that the getsockname() system call will be made in this case to determine the address that accepted the connection. If the ipv6only or so_keepalive parameters are used then for a given address:port pair a separate bind() call will always be made.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指示对给定的address：port对进行单独的 bind() 调用。事实是，如果有几个 listen 用相同的端口，但不同的地址的指令，和的一个 listen 对给定端口的所有地址的指令监听（ *: port ），将nginx的 bind() 只 *: port 。应该注意的是，在这种情况下将进行 getsockname() 系统调用，以确定接受连接的地址。如果使用 ipv6only 或 so_keepalive 参数，则对于给定 address ： port 配对将始终进行单独的 bind() 调用。
三个字母的国家/地区代码，例如“ RUS ”，“ USA ”。

trans-unit.source: time in seconds with a milliseconds resolution at the time of the log write
trans-unit.target: 以秒为单位的时间,在写入日志时的分辨率为毫秒。
时间为负数-“缓存控制：无缓存”。

trans-unit.source: time is positive or zero — “Cache-Control: max-age=t”, where t is a time specified in the directive, in seconds.
trans-unit.target: time是正数还是零—“ Cache-Control：max-age = t ”，其中 t 是指令中指定的时间，以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: time to connect to the upstream server (1.11.4); the time is kept in seconds with millisecond resolution. Times of several connections are separated by commas like addresses in the $upstream_addr variable.
trans-unit.target: 连接上游服务器的时间（1.11.4）；时间以毫秒为单位，以毫秒为单位。多个连接的时间之间用逗号分隔，例如$ upstream_addr变量中的地址。

trans-unit.source: time to receive the first byte of data (1.11.4); the time is kept in seconds with millisecond resolution. Times of several connections are separated by commas like addresses in the $upstream_addr variable.
trans-unit.target: 接收数据的第一个字节的时间（1.11.4）；时间以毫秒为单位，以毫秒为单位。多个连接的时间之间用逗号分隔，例如$ upstream_addr变量中的地址。

trans-unit.source: used by worker processes. One should bear in mind that controlling system libraries in this way is not always possible as it is common for libraries to check variables only during initialization, well before they can be set using this directive. An exception from this is an above mentioned live upgrade of an executable file.
trans-unit.target: 由工作进程使用。应该记住，以这种方式控制系统库并非总是可行的，因为通常只有在初始化期间才检查库，通常要在使用此伪指令设置变量之前检查库。上面提到的可执行文件的实时升级是一个例外。

trans-unit.source: user name supplied with the Basic authentication
trans-unit.target: 基本认证时提供的用户名

trans-unit.source: variable lookup is performed using prefix match of a record key and a search key (1.17.5); to match a record key, the record key must be a prefix of the search key
version. At this time, it provides almost the same functionality as a UNIX version of nginx except for XSLT filter, image filter, GeoIP module, and embedded Perl language.
trans-unit.target: 版本。此时,除了XSLT过滤器、图像过滤器、GeoIP模块和嵌入式Perl语言外,它提供了与UNIX版nginx几乎相同的功能。

trans-unit.target: 查看、修改或删除服务器。

trans-unit.source: was used as a default server name.
trans-unit.target: 被用作默认的服务器名称。

trans-unit.source: when a worker process is re-opening log files or is shutting down.
trans-unit.target: 当工作进程正在重新打开日志文件或正在关闭时。

trans-unit.source: where hash is a hexadecimal representation of the MD5 hash computed for the concatenation of the link and secret word, and prefix is an arbitrary string without slashes.
trans-unit.target: 其中 hash 是为链接和秘密字的连接计算得出的MD5哈希的十六进制表示形式，而 prefix 是不带斜杠的任意字符串。

trans-unit.source: where the name is a module name string, create_conf and init_conf are pointers to functions that create and initialize module configuration respectively. For core modules, nginx calls create_conf before parsing a new configuration and init_conf after all configuration is parsed successfully. The typical create_conf function allocates memory for the configuration and sets default values.
trans-unit.target: 其中 name 是模块名称字符串， create_conf 和 init_conf 是分别创建和初始化模块配置的函数的指针。对于核心模块，nginx 在解析新配置之前调用 create_conf ,在成功解析所有配置之后调用 init_conf 。典型的 create_conf 函数为配置分配内存并设置默认值。

trans-unit.source: whose certificate is stored in the browsers’ built-in certificate base (that lay in the house that Jack built).
trans-unit.target: 其证书存储在浏览器的内置证书库（位于Jack所建房屋中）中。

trans-unit.source: will set the idle timeout (TCP_KEEPIDLE) to 30 minutes, leave the probe interval (TCP_KEEPINTVL) at its system default, and set the probes count (TCP_KEEPCNT) to 10 probes.
trans-unit.target: 会将空闲超时（ TCP_KEEPIDLE ）设置为30分钟，将探测间隔（ TCP_KEEPINTVL ）保留为其系统默认值，并将探测计数（ TCP_KEEPCNT ）设置为10个探测。

trans-unit.source: writes a string to the error log on the error level of logging

trans-unit.source: writes a sent string to the error log on the info level of logging

trans-unit.target: 在日志记录的 warning 级别上将发送的 string 写入错误日志

trans-unit.source: writes the specified message into the error_log. If errno is non-zero, an error code and its description will be appended to the message.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 message 写入error_log。如果 errno 不为零，则错误代码及其描述将附加到消息中。
